inclusion.criterion: histologic diagnosis of high grade malignant glioma
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: solitary, supratentorial lesions that do not cross the midline
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: adequate hematologic reserve with WBC>=3000/mm3, absolute neutrophils >=1500/mm3 and platelets >=100,000/ mm3
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: pre-enrollment chemistry parameters must show: bilirubin<1.5X the institutional upper limit of normal (IUNL); AST or ALT<2.5X IUNL and creatinine<1.5X IUNL
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: ability to use a medically effective method of contraception during and for a period of three months after the treatment period
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: ability to understand and give written informed consent
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: known hypersensitivity or allergy to BCNU (carmustine) or other components of the Gliadel wafer, such as polifeprosan polymer
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: posterior Fossa or Brain stem tumor
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: open communication of the resection cavity with the ventricular system and tumors that cross the midline
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: concurrent severe medical or psychiatric illness, or abnormal laboratory values that preclude surgical candidacy or limits expected survival to less than 12 weeks
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a healthy woman with no underlying disease. She has an irregular menstrual cycle and does not smoke.
